body: Your skills allow you to perform with flawless artistry and impress large crowds. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—assured skill, ghostly performance, inspire minions, persuasive countenance, subtle magic; 3rd-Tier Abilities—critically skilled; 6th-Tier Abilities—unending performance.
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/6th-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Trickster Builds/Lead Performer
name: Lead Performer
